After beating this game for the first time, I can easily say it is nothing but absolutely stellar the whole way through. The character development, the set pieces, the quick, satisfying gunplay. It's all magnificent the whole way through. I can't stress enough how amazing this game is and how it is absolutely worth it for only 10 dollars. Hell, I would've happily paid 60 dollars for this masterpiece. Please, if you're reading this and not sure if you want to buy this game, buy it right now. I promise you it is worth every. Single. Penny.
Una genialidad de juego, altamente recomendado, ahora entiendo porque se le considera uno de los mejores juegos de la historia
very god game for 2006 or 2004 but yeah

I've finally played this game in 2022 and man it holds up to modern standards; I had a total blast playing this and replaying some segments to see what else it could do. A masterpiece indeed and an amazing series.

Without hesitating, Half Life 2 is one of the greatest achievements in the history of gaming. The game may have aged by way over a decade, but it still holds up. The gameplay is revolutionary, setting a standard for FPS games just as its predecessor. Whether you are new to PC gaming or a veteran this game is a must have, and don't be fooled by its age and graphics because it holds up great. My recommendation is simply to play this from the original Half Life from 1998 (before this game otherwise things will be very confusing) all the way up to the episodes in order that way you have the chronological experience. One of the greatest aspects of this series is that every single Half Life title so far is absolutely fantastic and a new game "Half Life Alyx" was released in 2020 in VR! This series is simply a must have, so go grab it and enjoy!

Simplemente es Half life. No por nada seguimos fielmente esperando la siguiente entrega o incluso apoyando desde la distancia los proyectos Borealis y similares! He terminado el juego hace unos minutos de nuevo, ya he perdido la cuenta de las veces que lo he hecho y en los diferentes ports. Sin duda lo recomiendo a pesar de que definitivamente hay un par de niveles que no me terminan de agradar por ser demasiado largos y sin interacciones. Una joya hoy y siempre. 8.5 de 10

It's difficult to separate Half-Life 2 from the mythos and culture that grew from it. While clearly a sequel, Half-life 2 extends well beyond its predecessor into then-unknown territory, establishing itself as a prototype for the modern FPS genre. Although the game is going on two decades old, I firmly believe that it holds up far greater than many others that succeeded it. If you can look past its quirks and comparably low-fidelity graphics, you will be treated to an action-packed ride of global proportions - and, as a bonus, see where some of those memes come from.
if you download MMOD then you can see the dirt on gordon's glasses

I can see why this is considered such a good game. The story telling, the atmosphere, the soundtrack, etc. is some of the best I've seen in a game!

A side note: Easy Mode is easy, to the point where you can ignore almost all the caches in the game, meanwhile Hard Mode has you scrabbling for ammo and health kits, desperately making you look in all the places you can find.
